医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
具有集成检测方法的实验室自动化释放了新的应用将酶标仪集成到 Eppendorf 的 epMotion 液体处理系统中，有助于研究人员在各种新应用中使用该系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Lab-automation-with-integrated-detection-method-unleashes-new-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Lab-automation-with-integrated-detection-method-unleashes-new-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edef0260-6b4a-4068-b364-f1656634e8b9 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 04:14:00 -0500 Lab automation with integrated detection method unleashes new applications
空间导航受损预示着早期阿尔茨海默病的风险伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，患有阿尔茨海默氏症的人在其他认知功能（包括记忆）出现问题之前，空间导航能力就会受损。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Impaired-spatial-navigation-signals-early-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Impaired-spatial-navigation-signals-early-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ebe2287-9878-4a57-a65d-1127ff0ae466 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:56:19 -0500 Impaired spatial navigation signals early Alzheimer's risk
双人骑行可提高帕金森病患者和护理合作伙伴的福祉根据今天（2024 年 2 月 29 日）发布的一项小型初步研究，骑行两人专用固定自行车可以改善帕金森病患者及其护理伙伴的健康和福祉，该研究将在美国科学院发表第 76 届神经病学年会将于 2024 年 4 月 13 日至 18 日在丹佛以现场和在线方式举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Tandem-cycling-boosts-well-being-for-Parkinsons-病人-and-care-partners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Tandem-cycling-boosts-well-being-for-Parkinsons-病人-and-care-partners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d94a4f1-ad98-4356-af7b-d8f7be40fc53 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:54:00 -0500 Tandem cycling boosts well-being for Parkinson's patients and care partners
了解遗忘性轻度认知障碍中的语言恶化与认知健康的老年人相比，患有轻度认知障碍的人，尤其是“遗忘亚型”(aMCI) 的人，因阿尔茨海默病而患痴呆症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Understanding-language-deterioration-in-amnestic-mild-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Understanding-language-deterioration-in-amnestic-mild-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be915853-5a2d-47b8-bd18-31650e24b68b Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:25:00 -0500 Understanding language deterioration in amnestic mild cognitive impairment
常见的前列腺癌测试可能会使黑人面临过度诊断的风险增加埃克塞特大学专家的一项新研究发现，广泛使用的前列腺癌检测可能会增加黑人过度诊断的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Common-prostate-cancer-test-may-leave-black-men-at-increased-risk-of-overdiagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Common-prostate-cancer-test-may-leave-black-men-at-increased-risk-of-overdiagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c1bf9a4-44ae-4a09-a93d-dc33424c220b Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:16:00 -0500 Common prostate cancer test may leave black men at increased risk of overdiagnosis
全面的蛋白质分析揭示了治疗透析相关淀粉样变性的潜在靶点透析患者经常出现与透析相关的淀粉样变性，并表现出损害其日常生活活动的骨和关节疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Compliance- Protein-analysis-reveals-pottial-targets-for-treating-dialysis-lated-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Compliance- Protein-analysis-reveals-pottial-targets-for-treating-dialysis-lated-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fc157cc-eb18-4b07-8259-1d96c6767bf1 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:09:19 -0500 Comprehensive protein analysis reveals potential targets for treating dialysis-related amyloidosis
COVID-19 的持久印记：长期嗅觉和味觉丧失研究显示，一些 COVID-19 康复者长期存在嗅觉和味觉功能障碍，这凸显了需要更好的临床支持和对长期影响的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/COVID-19s- permanent-mark-Long-term-smell-and-taste-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/COVID-19s- permanent-mark-Long-term-smell-and-taste-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511bf174-5482-40df-bd0a-25f2a8b87daf Thu, 29 Feb 2024 23:04:00 -0500 COVID-19's lasting mark: Long-term smell and taste loss
糖税在降低肥胖和糖尿病发病率方面显示出良好效果研究发现，国家 SSB 税收与减少肥胖、超重和糖尿病发病率（尤其是儿童）有关，这表明税收政策在改善公共卫生结果方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Sugar-tax-shows-sweet-results-in-cutting-obesity-and-diabetes-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Sugar-tax-shows-sweet-results-in-cutting-obesity-and-diabetes-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a23197fe-e589-4a9d-9812-2a0aa39efcbb Thu, 29 Feb 2024 22:53:00 -0500 Sugar tax shows sweet results in cutting obesity and diabetes rates
孤独感对老年人的身体健康产生负面影响阿姆斯特丹大学医学中心和格拉斯哥大学的研究人员表示，我们社会中老年人经常经历的孤独感会对他们的身体健康产生负面影响。阿姆斯特丹公共卫生局的流行病学家 Emiel Hoogendijk 分析了 130 多项研究的结果，发现孤独会导致身体虚弱加剧，进而增加抑郁、跌倒和认知能力下降等不良健康后果的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Loneiness-negatively-affects-the-physical-health-of-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Loneiness-negatively-affects-the-physical-health-of-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=826f39dd-459d-4364-b33d-5f31a91c748a Thu, 29 Feb 2024 22:21:06 -0500 Loneliness negatively affects the physical health of older adults
分析发现全球肥胖率超过十亿根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项全球分析，全球患有肥胖症的儿童、青少年和成人总数已超过 10 亿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Global-obesity-rates-surpass-one-billion-analysis-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240229/Global-obesity-rates-surpass-one-billion-analysis-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7022db9e-2b60-4d0d-9180-2f9da9726395 Thu, 29 Feb 2024 22:13:07 -0500 Global obesity rates surpass one billion, analysis finds
